title: Life expectancy at birth in Germany 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2012 to 2007.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2017 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2015.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2014.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2013.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2013 to 2012.
gold: This statistic shows the average life expectancy at birth in Germany from 2007 to 2017 . A child born in the year 2017 had an average life expectancy of 80.99 years .
